ARABIC: وَمَكَرُوا۟ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَٰكِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They plotted and Allah plotted. But Allah is the best of plotters.*
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they (the unbelievers) contrived a plot, and God did the like; and God's plan is the best.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then they schemed (against the Messiah), and Allah countered their schemes by schemes of His own. Allah is the best of schemers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The unbelievers plotted and God planned, but God is a much better planner;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And the disbelievers conspired (to kill Eisa), and Allah covertly planned to destroy them; and Allah is the best of secret planners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they (disbelievers) plotted and Allah planned too. And Allah is the Best of those who plot
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they planned and Allah (also) planned, and Allah is the best of planners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they devised, and God devised, and God is the best of devisers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they (the disbelievers) schemed, and Allah schemed (against them): and Allah is the best of schemers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And they schemed but God also schemed and God is the Best of Schemers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they plotted, and Allah plotted, and Allah is the Best of plotters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then they plotted [against Jesus], and Allah also devised, and Allah is the best of devisers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (the unbelievers) plotted and planned, and Allah too planned, and the best of planners is Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they (disbelievers) plotted [to kill 'Iesa (Jesus)], and Allah planned too. And Allah is the Best of the planners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They devised, and Allah devised. And Allah is the Best Devisor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They planned, and God planned; but God is the Best of planners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the disbelievers planned, but Allah planned. And Allah is the best of planners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:54] God says: And they, the disbelievers among the Children of Israel, schemed, against Jesus, by assigning someone to assassinate him; and God schemed, by casting the likeness of Jesus onto the person who intended to kill him, and so they killed him, while Jesus was raised up into heaven; and God is the best of schemers, most knowledgeable of him [Jesus].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they schemed) they, i.e. the Jews, planned to kill Jesus, (and Allah schemed (against them)) Allah wished to kill their man Tatianos: (and Allah is the best of schemers) the strongest of those who have a will; it is also said this means: the best of Makers.
